title: Rurouni Kenshin: Review Special
synopsis: Summary of various fighting scenes of the first half of the series and a brief overview of the Kyoto arc.
characters: ['Himura, Kenshin', 'Saitou, Hajime', 'Sagara, Sanosuke', 'Seta, Soujirou', 'Hiko, Seijuurou', 'Kamiya, Kaoru', 'Makimachi, Misao', 'Myoujin, Yahiko', 'Udou, Jine', 'Isurugi, Raijuta']
